job_details.degree_required: Computer Science degree or Information Technology, engineering related

jd: Hello,I Hope you are great in good health and sprit 🙂 !!Note : Urgent Curam Developer Opportunity in NY location Need Candidate with Java and Modern Data Experience with Cloud ( AWS, Azure, GCP) ideally in a health and human services agency Experience.Job Description -Role: Curam DeveloperLocation: NYC , NY – Preference for local candidates Hybrid-2-3 days/week on-siteDuration: 6+ monthsMOI: Skype Our direct client is searching for a Technical Consultant with Curam product experience to join their NYC-based team on a high-profile project, providing architecture guidance and design for solutions using the Cúram platform. Must Have Required Experience: 5 years of experience- Experience in applications design/development principles- Experience with Curam services delivery, including batch, online, rules, workflows, web services- Experience in Java/J2EE/JEE development, JDBC, SQL, XML, XSL, CSS, JavaScript- Experience with EJB, RSA, UNIX and NT operating systems, Oracle or DB2 databases, Websphere or Weblogic- Experience in modern UI/UX design and user research practices, tools, languages (e.g. React.js, Angular, CSS, JavaScript) Preferred Experience:- Computer Science degree or Information Technology, engineering related- Ability to apply data architecture and data government best practices (ideally in a health and human services agency), ETLs, BI platform, data integration, data quality assessments, data migration strategies and load management techniques- Cloud experience / delivery of applications with AWS, Azure, IBM Cloud, and other, Kubernetes/Docker- DevOps, development/integration tooling SCM, CI/CD and/or Jenkins, Pipelines(Azure or AWS), Ansible/Chef/Puppet, Packer/Terraform- Experience in delivery of applications on Cloud with AWS, Azure, IBM Cloud, and other - Experience on containers using Kubernetes, Helm charts - Ability to apply data architecture and data government best practices (ideally in a health and human services agency), ETLs, BI platform, data integration, data quality assessments, data migration strategies and load management techniques- Agile Scrum Master experience Regards!! Shubham SinghTechnical Recruiter| IT Healthcare & InformaticsTEK Inspirations LLC | 13573 Tabasco Cat Trail, Frisco, TX 75035 Email: shubham@tekinspirations.com II Phone: +1 469-498-0636Whats'up No. :+91-(953-232-0892) Disclaimer: If you are not interested in receiving our e-mails then please reply with a "REMOVE" in the subject line to remove@tekinspirations.com. And mention all the e-mail addresses to be removed with any e-mail addresses,which might be diverting the e-mails to you. We are sorry for the inconvenience
